inputs.name: delay_seconds
inputs.label: Delay (seconds)
inputs.description: The number of seconds before the workflow is triggered.

inputs.name: max_occurrences
inputs.label: Max Occurrences
inputs.description: Maximum number of times to execute this schedule.

inputs.name: until
inputs.label: Run Until (ISO Datetime)
inputs.description: Optional timestamp to stop running the schedule.

inputs.name: context
inputs.label: Execution Context
inputs.description: Additional data to include when triggering the workflow.

outputs.name: status
outputs.label: Schedule Status
outputs.description: Indicates whether the schedule was successfully registered.
